title: Raita - Perugu Pachadi - Healthy Indian Salad
content:
Raita, an Indian Cucumber Salad is one of the most popular salad recipes in India. This salad recipe is one of the coolest and healthiest salad. Raita is a yogurt based condiment that serves the purpose of a spread or dip.

This cool salad recipe has yogurt (dahi, curd, perugu) as the base and is a regular salad in regular Indian meals or thali. Its called Raita in North India and Pachadi in South India. Pachadis can be eaten as a salad and are usually served along with white rice, biryani and pulao (special Indian rice dishes). Raita can be made with most vegetables like onions, cucumber, carrots or leafy vegetables. Well, you can make raita with most veggies you can ever think of.:)

This is a very healthy salad and good for cooling our system. South Indians temper their pachadis with few spices. For tempering, heat 1 tsp of oil in a pan, add 1/2 tsp of mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add few curry leaves and a pinch of asafoetida. Remove from fire and add this to the pachadi.
